descriptions.title: Name-Burning Ritual
descriptions.content:
Description

A ritual of name-burning for the dead.

Related Terms

byang bzhus, byang bu bzhu ba, byang bsregs.

Example Texts

  • Bla ma mchod pa dang ‘brel ba’i gson gshin sbyang sreg (This is also for the living)
  • Byang sreg skabs kyi gsol ‘debs
